FileSystemEntryName.summary:
The read-only name property of
the interface returns a string
specifying the entry's name; this is the entry within its parent directory (the last
component of the path as indicated by the {{domxref("FileSystemEntry.fullPath",
"fullPath")}} property).

remarks.para:
-File and Directory Entries API
-Introduction to the File and Directory Entries API
-
-

FileSystemEntryName.value: A string indicating the entry's name.
